title: Gydom Men's Smartwatch with Phone Function & Alexa, 1.8 Inch Fitness Watch with 100 Sports Modes & IP68, Heart Rate SpO2 Sleep Monitor, Watch Pedometer Watch for Android iOS
description: Gydom Smartwatch - Start your smart life!   Why choose Gydom smartwatch? Gydom is dedicated to developing stylish and practical smartwatches. If you are looking for a stylish and creative multifunctional smart watch and fitness tracker, you will find everything you need for everyday use. Bluetooth Calls and Messages: During training, you can make/receive calls and read messages via your watch. Built-in Alexa voice assistant: Make your hands free by controlling your women's smartwatch with your voice. Life companion: The sleep tracking function records your entire sleep and tracks heart rate, blood oxygen and stress levels in real time. High-quality display: The 1.8 inch display makes every second count, with a slim, square dial and an individual dial. 101+ sports modes: 101+ sports modes, including walking, running, cycling, cricket, football and tennis. IP68 waterproof: Whether you wash your hands, sweat or it rains, you don't have to worry about water entering (do not use the women's watch in the sauna or in hot water) There are also useful functions such as music control, weather information, alarm clock and stopwatch that provide more surprises!     With the smart watch with phone function, you can make and answer calls directly from your watch without taking out your phone! Bluetooth Calls Phonebook: allows you to quickly contact family and friends by adding contacts in the "VeryFit" app.Call history: You can view a list of all outgoing, incoming and missed calls with detailed information (date, time, duration, etc.). Dial keyboard: You can enter phone numbers to make calls, just like on a mobile phone to make it more convenient. Message Notifications Receive notifications from Facebook, WhatsApp, SMS and more. Helpful for your life and work. Alexa Voice Assistant Set alarms and reminders, check the weather and control your smart watch by voice.     Sleep Monitoring Simply wear the men's smartwatch while sleeping. You do not need to set it up on the watch, but can view detailed sleep reports (hours of deep sleep, light sleep, wakefulness) directly in the app. All-day health monitoring The women's fitness watch measures your fitness all day long and monitors blood oxygen, heart rate, stress and breathing exercises in real time so you can adjust your breathing.   101 Sports Modes & Activity Tracker The sports watch supports 101 sports modes: Walking, running, cycling, cricket, football, tennis, etc. After training, you can view the data on your women's smart watch or in the "VeryFit" app, where you can analyze the data (training time, calories, distance, steps, etc.) to make better adjustments and organise your fitness program. *The pedometer watch comes with 20 training modes, more can be added via the "VeryFit" app. (Veryfit → Device → Other Settings → Sport → Edit)   Free yourself from daily charging The women's smartwatch can be fully charged in 2 hours and offers a service life of 7 days and a standby time of 30 days.   Personalised dials There are 100 dials to choose from in the app (VeryFit), or you can choose your favorite picture to show your personality.   IP68 waterproof Even if you wash your hands or go swimming, your smart watch will not be damaged. However, it is not suitable for use in hot water or sea water.
features: 24/7 health monitoring the women's fitness watch will automatically count your daily steps, distance and calories burned. Advanced sensors monitor your heart rate, blood oxygen and stress all the time. Seamlessly sync your data with the "Veryfit" app to get in-depth insights into your health that will help you make smarter choices for a healthier lifestyle.

Bluetooth calls and Alexa integrated With Bluetooth 5.3, you can make/answer/reject calls on the go with this smart watch. Also receive notifications from your smartphone on your wrist, such as Facebook, Instagram and more. Works with Amazon Alexa, command your device to set an alarm, control music, or get the latest weather forecast with a simple voice command by talking to your watch. (Note the watch cannot send messages, or text back).

100 sports modes and IP68 waterproof the 2024 latest sports watch supports over 100+ sports modes. Accurately monitor exercise time and calories burned, whether you are walking, running, yoga, playing rugby or even swimming. Equipped with IP68 waterproof, it promises easy use when washing hands and sweaty exercises.

Versatile functions and excellent battery life the women's watch offers a number of other functions, including weather forecasts, sedentary reminder, torch, music and camera control, motion detection, alarms, stopwatch, timer, breathing guide, wake up and more. With a short charging time of 2 hours, the smart watch offers a remarkable battery life of 7 days with normal use and up to 30 days standby time.

1.8 inch HD screen and personalised dials the women's watch has a 1.8 inch HD touch screen with high sensitivity, which gives you a different visual pleasure. Express your personality to your own with 100+ free dials and fully customizable dials.

Widely compatible and easy to use wireless connection with iOS or Android smartphones (iOS 9.0 or higher, Android 6.0 or higher). The setup is very simple and only requires four steps 1. charge the watch; 2. download the app "Veryfit"; 3. Turn on Bluetooth on the smartphone; 4. Scan the QR code on the men's watch to pair it.

title: Adam's Car Wash Shampoo (Gallon) - pH Best Car Wash Soap For Snow Foam Cannon or Gun For Pressure Washer & 5 Gallon Bucket, Powerful Safe Spot Free Cleaning Liquid Auto Detergent
description: The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked. Our best in class Car Shampoo Adam's Car Shampoo provides a thorough, washing experience, its scratch-free, produces thick luxurious suds, and provide superior results, no matter the setting. It's also pH neutral formula, so it won't strip any protection on the surface, or leave water spots. Our Car Shampoo has been tested by thousands of users and has become a crowd favorite for even the most elite detailers and everyday users. Previous page Next page 1 Before & After 2 pH Neutral Formula 3 Produces Thick Suds 4 Safely Removes Dirt 5 Safe For Use In Sunlight A premium kind of soap Made With Quality Ingredients Adam's Car Shampoo is a pH neutral blend of lubricants and surfactants that increase the effectiveness of your washing experience. This product safely & effectively removes dirt, debris, pollen, and other contaminants. Other car wash soaps on the market can be overly concentrated, which causes harm to your exterior but our Car Shampoo is made to be safe on all surfaces and will not spot your paint or dry out your plastic and rubber. A customer favorite Highly Rated In The Car Care Community Car shampoo was one of our first products and one that we can honestly say is a near perfect blend. With our Car Shampoo you can literally let the foam sit on your vehicle all day, in the sun and it will rinse off clean without any left over residue. Gently glide dirt and debris off paintwork Perfect For Weekly Washing Car shampoo is powerful, yet gentle and safe. When released through your wash mitt, foam gun or foam cannon, it provides a thick, clinging foam that lubricates the surfaces, pulls out the dirt and rinses off clean, leaving a high gloss shine. Where to use car shampoo? Bucket, Foam Gun or Foam Cannon At Adam's we recommend using our Car Shampoo with a Wash Bucket and a Foam Gun or Foam Cannon. Click through the carousel to see how our Car Shampoo works with these detailing tools. How it works Car Shampoo + Wash Bucket In a bucket, you only need two-ounces of Car Shampoo. We recommend applying soap directly onto your wash pad or mitt, and then filling the bucket with water. Instantly, you'll notice thick, luxurious, foaming bubbles. The formula acts as a lubricant when gliding on your paint. How it works Car Shampoo + Foam Gun A foam gun is a simple detailing tool that produces moderate foam. In comparison to a foam cannon, foam guns produce less foam. Foam guns are still an effective foaming tool that connects to any garden hose without the need to purchase a washer. Adam's Foam Gun's are 35-ounce canisters that require only 4-ounces of Car shampoo. Pro-Tip: Before adding shampoo to your Foam Gun, add water! Otherwise, you'll be playing in bubbles instead of washing your car. How it works Car Shampoo + Foam Cannon Adam's Foam Cannon produces the most foam out of any detailing tool on the market. Foam Cannons do not attach to a garden hose and require a pressure washer for use. For best results, we recommend using 4-ounces of Car Shampoo. Pro-Tip: Before adding Car Shampoo to your Foam Cannon, add water! Otherwise, you'll be playing in bubbles instead of washing your car. Adam's keys to washing Introduction To Washing Improper washing technique is the #1 culprit for creating swirl marks in the finish of your vehicle. If you’ve spent many hours in the garage or driveway polishing your vehicle to near-perfection, the last thing you want to do is an incorrect wash process, which can reintroduce imperfections like swirl marks, haze, and scratches back into the finish! Two is better than one Two Bucket Washing Method One very important aspect of safely washing your vehicle is the Two Bucket Wash Method. For those not familiar with what this is, the Two Bucket Wash involves having one bucket for your premium car shampoo and a second bucket filled with clean water. Both buckets should have a Grit Guard at the bottom of the bucket, to act as a dirt filtering system. Clean water with a Grit Guard is used to clean your mitt, while the other is filled with soapy water to reintroduce soapy suds to your paint. Wash with the right product grouping Which Washing Option Suits Your Needs? Option 1: Car Shampoo + Buckets (2) + Grit Guards (2) + Wash Mitt + Drying Towel or Air Cannon + Garden HoseOption 2: Car Shampoo + Buckets (2) + Grit Guards (2)+ Wash Mitt + Drying Towel or Air Cannon + Garden Hose + Foam GunOption 3: Car Shampoo + Buckets (2) + Grit Guards (2) + Wash Mitt + Drying Towel or Air Cannon + Pressure Washer + Foam Cannon Pad, mitt or sponge? Use High-Quality Scrubbing Options Remember, wash pads are one of the items in your detailing arsenal that touch your vehicle the most, so it’s extremely important to choose the best scrubbing option for your vehicle to keep it looking its absolute best. There are several types, such as wool, microfiber or chenille. In selecting the right accessory, it needs to be very soft, very absorbent, won't break down on you, and traps dirt in the deep pile microfiber. Adam's scrubbing tools are tested for premium results. Safe drying methods Drying Towels or Air-Forced Dryers The last thing to consider before washing your car is what type of drying products you will use. If you are looking for the safest way to dry your vehicle, we recommend our Air Cannons, which blow heated, filtered air for a spotless finish. Alternatively, our Ultra Plush Drying Towel is perfect as one of the final media to touch your vehicle during the wash process, as it is a large, soft and absorbent microfiber towel. Pro-Tip: Use Adam's Detail Spray as a drying aid to avoid spotting Which soap is right for you? title: Kidde Hardwired Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, AA Battery Backup Smoke Alarm, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators, Meets New UL Standard
description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Hardwired Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, AA Battery Backup, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 30CUAR. This smoke & CO detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. To detect carbon monoxide, an electrochemical sensor is used. This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch smoke & CO alarm is powered by 120V AC wiring with 2 AA alkaline replaceable backup batteries (included) for continual detection even during outages. Batteries should be replaced every 6 months or when the alarm sounds a low battery chirp. In addition, it’s self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. This Kidde combination alarm is equipped with end-of-life notifications that will beep to remind you it’s time to replace it at the of its 10-year lifespan. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217, UL 2034 4th Edition, FCC, and CSFM.
features: 2-IN-1 DETECTION Alerts you to both smoke & carbon monoxide (CO) using a single, cost-effective detector.
HARDWIRED & 2 AA BATTERY BACKUP (Included) Operates on 120V AC wiring (installed in the ceiling) with 2 AA alkaline batteries that provide battery backup coverage during power outages.
ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY Reduces false smoke alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition, UL 2034 4th Edition, & FCC standards.
INTERCONNECT CAPABILITY When one alarm sounds, they all sound, so you can get out faster. (Different models offer different interconnection options and requirements. See User Guide for more info.)
SELF-TESTING ALARM Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke or carbon monoxide detected & a loud 85-decibel alarm will sound.
TEST & HUSH BUTTON Makes it easy to test the 5-inch combination detector and silence false alarms, should they occur.
10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY Warranty begins when the alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced.

title: Selenium High Dose 365x Selenium 200 μg Tablets - Selenium Complex of 3 High-Quality Selenium Sources: Selenium Yeast, Selenium Methionine & Sodium Selenite, No Unwanted Additives, 100% Vegan
description: Selen complex – selenium tablets with 3 high-quality selenium moulds for optimal bioavailability The selenium tablets contain a finely tuned selenium complex of 3 high-quality selenium shapes: Selenium yeast, selenium methionine and sodium selenite. The body therefore has different absorption paths for the contained selenium, which gives the Selen complex an exceptionally high bioavailability. Selenium tablets – optimally high dose and bioavailable 200 µg of selenium per tablet, 3 high-quality selenium forms, optimally supplied for 365 days With 200 µg of selenium per tablet, the SELEN complex is effectively highly dosed and covers in addition to the basic needs of selenium as well as a possible additional requirement. The Selen complex comes in a storage pack with 365 selenium tablets and thus ensures an optimal supply of selenium for a whole year.   Selenium - task and function in the body Our body needs selenium for a diverse spectrum of tasks and functions. Since selenium occurs only in very small quantities in the body, selenium is also referred to as a trace element. Selenium plays an important role for our immune system and contributes to its normal function. As an antioxidant, selenium also helps to protect the cells from oxidative stress. The mineral selenium is involved in various processes for the formation of skin cells and thus contributes to the maintenance of normal skin. In addition, selenium is also involved in maintaining normal hair. Another important feature of selenium is its contribution to the normal function of the thyroid.   Selenium deficiency due to too little selenium in the food Selenium is one of the critical nutrients in Germany. There are indications that approx. 70% of the population tend to take too little selenium and therefore there is a risk for many people to develop a lack of selenium in the long term. One reason for this is that many farmed soils in Germany are relatively low in selenium. Foods grown in Germany therefore have a lower selenium content than food e.g. from North America, as the soils are rich in selenium. Selenium is found in animal products such as (meat, eggs, fish) as well as in vegetable foods (nuts, seeds, legumes). One of the most selenium foods is the Brazil nut, which comes from the rainforest. If you eat very consciously and regularly consume selene-rich food, you can ensure a sufficient supply of this important trace element. In practice, however, selenium is often too short, so a targeted dietary supplement is very meaningful.   Selenium tablets with three high-quality selenium moulds For our selenium tablets, we have deliberately chosen a complex with three high-quality shapes: Selenium yeast, selenium methionine and sodium selenite. In this way, the body has different absorption paths for the selenium, which thus gives the selenium tablets excellent bioavailability. With a total of 200 µg of selenium per tablet, our SELEN complex is optimally high dose and covers a possible additional requirement without any problems. In the production of selenium tablets, we consistently focus on unwanted additives such as magnesium stearate, artificial dyes or coating agents. Therefore, the ingredient list of selenium tablets is therefore short. The selenium tablets also have a very small size, so you can take them comfortably with a large sip of water. features: The Selen complex includes a complete annual supply of selenium tablets - 365 selenium tablets each with 200 μg elemental selenium from a complex with 3 high-quality selenium forms. The selenium tablets are very small and therefore easy to swallow.

Selenium complex our selenium tablets contain a finely tuned product formula made from three high-quality selenium forms selenium yeast, L-selenomethionine and sodium selenite. Thanks to the combination of these three selenium forms, the body has different absorption paths for the selenium contained, which gives the selenium tablets an exceptionally high bioavailability.

Optimal high dose the selenium tablets are high dose and deliver 200 μg of elemental selenium per tablet. Thus, the selenium tablets not only cover the basic selenium requirement (55 μg per day), but also an additional requirement due to illness, stress or intense sports.

Immune system, cell protection and more the trace element selenium contributes to the normal function of our immune system. Selenium also contributes to the protection of cells from oxidative stress. Furthermore, the mineral selenium makes an important contribution to the maintenance of normal hair and nails.

100% vegan, made in Germany for our selenium tablets, we do not use any ingredients from animal origin and therefore the selenium tablets are 100% vegan. The production takes place exclusively in Germany and is therefore subject to the strict German guidelines for the production of dietary supplements as well as regular controls.

The charging speed is three times that of an ordinary 5W charger. Firmly suck your iPhone while charging and prevent it from dropping. Take your iPhone on a safe fast and convenient wireless charging trip.

👍【𝗨𝗦𝗕-𝗔/𝗖 𝗗𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗜𝗻𝗽𝘂𝘁 & 𝟰𝗳𝘁/𝟭.𝟮𝗺 𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗖𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 】The iPhone magnetic charger has an integrated 4ft/1.2m charging cable and two adapter connection modes, Type-C and USB-A. The long enough charging cable allows the flexibility to use your iPhone while lying on your bed/couch and use your old charger without having to spend money on a new charger. Note If a maximum 15w charging rate is required it is recommended to use a power adapter of 18w or higher (❌ product doesn't come with an adapter)

👍【𝗟𝗘𝗗 𝗦𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗜𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿】The Apple wireless magnetic charger has a blue LED light to visually display the iPhone charging status, standby input 9V blue breathing light comes on (goes off after 3 seconds); normal charging blue breathing pulse (goes off after a few seconds); foreign object detection blue fast flashing. At night when your phone is charging the soft blue breathing light comes on and then turns off automatically, a thoughtful design definitely suitable for a bedside table magnetic safety wireless charger.

👍【𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝗿 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻】This wireless charger pad for iPhone always charges your device safely and securely. title: Airthings 2960 View Plus - Battery Powered Radon & Air Quality Monitor (PM, CO2, VOC, Humidity, Temp, Pressure)
description: Get the big picture of what's in the air you breathe at home. Comprehensive, WiFi-connected, battery-operated indoor air quality monitor with always-on radon detection. Get powerful peace of mind with seven air quality sensors. Learn if your home has a radon gas problem that needs fixing. Radon is the number one cause of lung cancer among non-smokers and kills more than 6x the number of people than home fires and carbon monoxide poisoning combined. The digital radon detector uses passive diffusion chamber sampling with alpha spectrometry detection for accurate and reliable readings. Ensure that your radon mitigation solution is working as expected. Always on monitoring lets you identify if your mitigation solution stops working correctly so you can respond quickly. Track the concentrations of fine particulate matter (PM 2.5) in your home's air. More and more people live in areas affected by city pollution and wildfires, a PM 2.5 air quality monitor can help you understand whether you are affected and how best to minimize the risks of air pollution. Discover the sources of airborne chemicals (VOCs) in your home. Not all VOCs are unsafe but many can cause skin and respiratory irritation. When you link high VOC levels with your symptoms, you are better able to eliminate those VOC triggers. Track CO2 concentrations to optimize airflow in your rooms. Adequate ventilation is key to creating a comfortable environment and decreasing virus transmission risk. Watch in real-time how VOC and CO2 levels go down when you improve ventilation. View Plus connects directly with other Airthings air quality monitors in your home to enable a multi-room monitoring solution.
features: ALWAYS-ON AIR QUALITY SENSORS WiFi connected indoor air quality monitor measuring radon gas, PM2.5 (air pollution detector), carbon dioxide (CO2), VOCs (airborne such as kitchen gases, fumes and cleaning products), humidity, temperature, and air pressure. The monitor requires the Airthings app to function. Operating Temperature 4 to 40°C / 39 to 104°F.Sensor type Electrochemical

title: First Alert BRK 3120B Hardwired Photoelectric and Ionization Smoke Alarm with Battery Backup, Dual Sensing Smoke Alarm, 1-Pack
description: The First Alert Model No. 3120B is a wire in, 120V AC 60Hz single and/or multiple station photoelectric and ionization dual sensor smoke alarm specifically designed for residential and institutional applications including sleeping rooms of hospitals, hotels, motels, dormitories and other multifamily dwellings as defined in standard NFPA 101. Model 3120B complies with UL217, CSFM, NFPA 72, HUD, FHA and other agencies that model their codes after the above agencies. It meets building codes where AC/DC photoelectric and ionization combination smoke alarms are required. The BRK 3120B is a state of the art hardwired with battery backup smoke alarm that features dual photoelectric and ionization smoke sensing technologies. This alarm features two latching features and two silence features. Alarm Latch: Easily identifies initiating alarm even after alarm condition has subsided. Low Battery Latch: Identifies which unit is in low battery condition by blinking the green power light. Low Battery Silence: Temporarily silence the low battery chirp for up to eight hours. Alarm Silence: Silence alarm for several minutes. Other features include an85dB horn, single button test/silence, an easy access battery drawer and dust cover. OptiPath 360 Technology: Exclusive patented technology provides 360 degrees of direct access to the smoke sensor. Two locking features are provided to prevent battery theft and/or theft of the unit. Connection to AC power is made with a Quick Connect wiring harness. Installation is quick, easy and cost effective.

title: Milk Thistle Capsules High Dose 120x - 5-fold Complex with Milk Thistle, Artichoke, Dandelion, Desmodium & Choline - Liver Function & Fat Metabolism - 200 mg Silymarin per Day - Supply for 4 Months
description: Milk thistle complex - innovative 5-in-1 complex to support liver function The milk thistle complex contains an innovative product formula with four high-quality plant extracts and bioactive choline. The finely tuned combination of milk thistle, artichoke, dandelion and desmodium (beggar's herb) provides the body with valuable secondary plant substances and bitter substances. The choline contained contributes to normal liver function and normal fat metabolism and also contributes to normal homocysteine metabolism, a detoxification process in the body. 250 mg milk thistle extract, 200 mg artichoke extract, 100 mg choline One capsule milk thistle complex contains 250 mg milk thistle extract in combination with 200 mg artichoke extract, 100 mg dandelion extract and 25 mg desmodium extract (beggar's herb). The 4 high-quality plant extracts are meaningfully complemented by choline, a vitamin-like substance. Choline is a semi-essential vital substance and contributes to normal liver function.   Milk thistle complex with 5 active ingredients The liver acts as a central detoxification organ in our body and forms an effective filter between the intestine and the rest of the body's circulation. The liver thus prevents pathogens or harmful substances from the intestine from entering the bloodstream of our body. With our milk thistle complex, we pursue the approach of providing the body with valuable vital substances and optimally supporting the liver function. For this purpose, we have optimally combined a high-quality milk thistle extract with artichoke, dandelion and desmodium extract (beggar's herb) and supplemented it with bioactive choline. The innovative 5-in-1 product formula provides the body with valuable secondary plant substances and bitter substances in concentrated form. The choline contained contributes to normal liver function as well as normal fat metabolism.   Milk thistle extract with high silymarin content The key component of our milk thistle complex is the high-quality milk thistle extract, which has an exceptionally high silymarin content of 80%. Silymarin is a mixture of the flavanonol derivatives silibinin, isosilibinin, silicristine and silidianine - i.e. the secondary plant substances that make milk thistle so valuable body. We use a highly concentrated 25:1 extract, which is extracted exclusively from the seeds of milk thistle. Using a gentle process, one gram of milk thistle extract is obtained from 25 grams of milk thistle seeds. One capsule milk thistle complex contains 250 mg milk thistle extract (25:1) and thus provides 200 mg of valuable silymarin.   Bioactive choline for normal liver function The liver plays a crucial role in regulating fat metabolism in the body. Our complex contains bioactive choline, which contributes an important contribution to normal fat metabolism and in this way also to the normal functioning of the liver. Choline is a vitamin-like substance, which was originally also referred to as vitamin B4. The body can produce choline itself, but not in the required amounts and therefore choline is now considered a semi-essential nutrient. Animal products such as egg yolk, meat, fish and offal are particularly rich in choline. In plant foods, choline is found in soybeans, almonds or broccoli - but in significantly lower amounts compared to animal products. Our milk thistle complex provides the body with 100 mg of choline per day from high-quality choline bitartrate and thus makes an important contribution to an optimal supply of the body with this vital substance. title: Kidde Smoke Detector, 4-Inch Compact, AA Battery Powered
description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Smoke Detector, 4-Inch Compact, AA Battery Powered, model 10SDR. This compact smoke detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. This smoke alarm’s 4-Inch design is smaller than the average 5-Inch design and is great for small spaces without sacrificing the key features you need. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the smoke alarm is powered by 2 replaceable AA alkaline batteries (included) for continual detection even during outages. Batteries should be replaced every 6 months or when the alarm sounds a low battery chirp. In addition, it’s self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. This Kidde smoke alarm is equipped with end-of-life notifications that will beep to remind you it’s time to replace it at the of its 10-year lifespan. title: Midea Flexify French Door Toaster Oven Air Fryer Combo, 26.4 QT, Extra Large Air Fryer Countertop Oven 10-in-1 Combo, 25% Faster Cooking and 90% Less Oil, Stainless Steel
description: Elevate your kitchen with the Midea Flexify French Door Air Fryer Oven, a 'Best of KBIS' winner in 2024. This stylish air fryer oven combines elegance with practicality, offering professional air-frying capabilities and versatile cooking modes to meet all your culinary needs. It can handle everything from breakfast for your kids to a large gathering, helping you prepare delicious meals for every occasion. Flexify FAQ： 1. About Preheat Function With Flexify's powerful Air Cyclone technology, the oven heats up quickly, eliminating the need for preheating when using the air fry function. Simply place frozen foods directly on the frying basket and start the air fry program. No preheating required – just crispy, healthy results. 2. About Stop or end the Program during oven working While the oven is running, press and hold the Stop button for 3 seconds to pause the current program and choose a new function. 3. How to use accessories in the box： Crumb Tray: To ensure optimal cooking performance, place the crumb tray at the bottom of the oven, below the heating element. Allow the tray to cool completely before cleaning. Air Fry Basket: When using the air fry function, place the air fry basket on the rack and spread food evenly within the basket for the best air frying results. Baking Rack: For baking bread, pizza, and other items, use the baking rack to achieve a crispy crust on both sides. Baking Tray: Use the baking tray to hold batters, fillings, and to maintain the shape of cakes, cookies, and puddings. 4. How to clean my air fryer oven？ -Power off and cool down: Always unplug the oven and allow it to cool completely before cleaning. -Remove the crumb tray: Remove the crumb tray from the oven and clean it with warm water and dish soap. -Clean the interior: •For light stains: Wipe the interior, door, and heating elements with a soft cloth and warm water. •For stubborn stains: Create a paste of baking soda and water, apply it to the stains, let it sit for a few minutes, then scrub. -Clean the exterior: •For standard materials: Wipe the exterior of the oven with a soft cloth and warm water. •For stainless steel: Use a stainless steel cleaner. -Clean the glass door: Clean both sides of the glass door with a glass cleaner. -Dry thoroughly: Ensure the oven is completely dry inside and out after cleaning. 5. Temperature Warning The top exterior and glass door will become hot during operation. Avoid direct contact to prevent burns.

title: First Alert Slim Photoelectric Smoke Alarm with 10-Year Sealed Battery, PR710, White
description: Featuring a low-profile, contemporary design, the First Alert PR710 Slim Photoelectric Smoke Alarm with 10-Year Battery provides the same protection as a standard smoke alarm while taking up only a fraction of the space. This slim, battery-operated smoke alarm requires no hardwiring for installation, making it an ideal solution for those who want to enhance fire safety without hiring an electrician. It features a built-in 10-year lithium-ion battery that provides continuous power for up to a decade. Equipped with an ultra-reliable photoelectric sensor, the smoke alarm detects smoke from slow-burning, smoldering fires while keeping false alarms to a minimum. A patented smoke entry system further enhances the detector's reliability by providing a direct path to the smoke sensor. The simple twist-lock mounting system installs easily onto a wall or ceiling, while the tamper-resistant locks help prevent removal of the battery to keep the alarm secure. Half as thick as a standard alarm, the smoke detector has a sleek, slim design that blends in seamlessly with most decor. A loud 85-decibel alarm sounds when smoke is detected, and a convenient test/silence button lets you easily check alarm function and mute false alarms.
features: Complies with all current 10-year legislation in U.S. states cities where required

Equipped with photoelectric smoke sensor optimized to detect larger smoke particles produced by smoldering fires; helps minimize the number of false alarms
Patented smoke entry system allows for a direct path to the sensor
Features loud 85-decibel alarm and single test silence button
First Alert has been the most trusted brand in home safety since launching the first residential smoke alarm in 1958 (Based on a First Alert Brand Trust Survey in February 2018)

title: Kidde Hardwired Smoke Detector, AA Battery Backup, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators
description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Hardwired Smoke Detector, AA Battery Backup, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 20SAR. This smoke detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. Plus, it is interconnected so when one alarm sounds, they all do so you never miss an emergency (see user guide for compatibility with other Kidde models). This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch smoke alarm is powered by 120V AC wiring with 2 AA alkaline replaceable backup batteries (included) for continual detection even during outages. Batteries should be replaced every 6 months. In addition, the detector is self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217, FCC, and CSFM.
features: DETECTS SMOKE Sounds a loud 85-decibel alarm when smoke is detected - 3 long beeps with red LED light flashing in time, repeating.
HARDWIRED & 2 AA BATTERY BACKUP (Included) Operates on 120V AC wiring (installed in the ceiling) with 2 AA alkaline batteries that provide battery backup coverage during power outages.
ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY Reduces false alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition & FCC standards.
SELF-TESTING ALARM Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
INTERCONNECT CAPABILITY When one alarm sounds, they all sound, so you can get out faster. (Different models offer different interconnection options and requirements. See User Guide for more info.)
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke detected.
TEST & HUSH BUTTON Makes it easy to test the 5-inch smoke detector and silence false alarms, should they occur.
10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY Warranty begins when the alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced.

title: Kidde Hardwired Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, 10-Year Battery Backup, Voice Alerts, Interconnectable LED Warning Light Indicators
description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Hardwired Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, 10-Year Battery Backup, Voice Alerts, Interconnectable LED Warning Light Indicators, model 30CUA10-V. This smoke & CO detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. To detect carbon monoxide, an electrochemical sensor is used. This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. title: Topcee Weighted Blanket (20lbs 60"x80" Queen Size) for Adult All-Season Summer Fall Winter Cooling Breathable Heavy Microfiber Material with Glass Beads Big Blanket Soft Thick Comfort
description: What Can We Do to Better Adapt to a Weighted Blanket? A weighted blanket is heavier than normal blanket. If you have got a suitable weighted blanket based on your body weight and bed size, pls spend 7-10 days to adapt to the blanket weight. For the new user, pls cover your waist and hip first while avoiding your shoulders and calves. Then, slowly adjust the blanket and cover the whole body. After fully adapting to the weighted blanket, it could be used with other duvet together for keeping warm in the cold winter.
features: 【PREMIUM MATERIAL】 - Topcee weighted blanket is made of soft breathable microfiber material and filled with 0.8-1 mm non-toxic hypo-allergenic glass beads. This blanket could providing a cooling sensation in the summer & a breathable warmth in the winter.

【RECOMMENDED WEIGHT/SIZE】 - Please choose 8%-12% of your body weight, which would help you sleep better and faster. We recommend 48''x72'' for twin bed, 60''x80'' for queen bed. This weighted throw blanket not only can be used at sleep, but also can be used while reading, relaxing, or meditating.

【Precise positioning technology of glass beads】- We have observed that for weighted blankets, the biggest problem is that as the beads move in the blanket, the weight becomes more and more uneven. To solve this problem, we designed a professional tool to fill glass beads. This tool makes the beads evenly distributed in the blanket. At the same time, we use high-strength sewing thread, which is very strong to ensure that the beads will not enter another area from one area during use of blanket.

【ABOUT SIZE】-Weighted Blanket is much smaller than ordinary blanket, because it is supposed to concentrate the weight on human body so the weighted blanket would not hang over the edge of your bed. Please don't mistake it as incorrect size when you get it.In addition, hand washing and hanging to dry are the best cleaning methods.

【DECENT GIFT IDEA】-An idea gift is a moment of pure joy both for the recipient and giver, and it don’t need to be expensive. What could be a better gift than weighted blanket? It’s good for everyone, whether men or women. Also it can be the gift for any holiday, such as birthday, Christmas, Valentine's Day , special anniversaries, Father's Day, Mother's Day and so on. So just pick up a good weighted blanket, give to your family members or friends, then enjoy your happy time!
【IPMORTANT NOTE!】 This product model is only for adults and is strictly prohibited for children under eight years old.

title: Kidde Smoke Detector, 10-Year Battery Powered, LED Warning Light Indicators
description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Smoke Detector, 10-Year Battery Powered, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 20SD10. This compact smoke detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch smoke alarm is powered by a 10-year built-in lithium battery, so you never have to change a battery for the life of the detector (not a battery performance claim). In addition, it’s self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. This Kidde smoke alarm is equipped with an end-of-life notifications that will beep to remind you it’s time to replace it at the of its 10-year lifespan. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217, FCC, and CSFM.
features: DETECTS SMOKE Sounds a loud 85-decibel alarm when smoke is detected - 3 long beeps with red LED light flashing in time, repeating.
NEVER-CHANGE 10-YEAR BATTERY No low battery chirps or battery changes for 10 years & saves up to $40 over the life of the detector. (10-yr limited warranty on alarm, not a battery performance claim.)
ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY Reduces false alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition & FCC standards.
SELF-TESTING ALARM Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke detected.
EASY INSTALLATION No wiring needed, simply mount the bracket onto the ceiling and twist & click the 5-inch smoke alarm into the bracket.
TEST & HUSH BUTTON Makes it easy to test the 5-inch smoke detector and silence false alarms, should they occur.
10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY Warranty begins when the alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced.

title: Kidde Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, AA Battery Powered, LED Warning Light Indicators, 1 Pack
description: The Kidde Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, AA Battery Powered, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 900-CUDR, is an alarm combo that detects smoke, fire, & carbon monoxide gas, using a single alarm. Operating on two AA batteries (included) for protection during a power failure, the Kidde Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarm is equipped with self-testing components that are always checking the unit to ensure the device is operating as expected*. Photoelectric sensing technology that senses visible fire particles (associated with smoldering fires), while an electrochemical sensor detects carbon monoxide. When a smoke, fire, or carbon monoxide event occurs, the Kidde fire alarm warns with an 85-decibel alarm sound & flashing red LEDs. Three LED warning lights provide status of the alarm: a green status alerts to the alarm operating properly, amber alerts to faulty operation or connection, and red alerts to smoke, fire, or carbon monoxide. When the smoke alarm is at the end of its life span, the detector will announce, "Replace Alarm!". The Smart-Hush button silences the unit for approximately 8 minutes, which is helpful when this smoke detector carbon monoxide detector combo sounds from things like routine cooking or shower steam. Install a carbon monoxide smoke detector combo on every level of your home and near bedrooms to help keep your family safe. UL Certified with a 10-year limited manufacturer's warranty. Meets requirements of UL 2034, UL217, NFPA72, (chapter 11 2002 edition) The State of California Fire Marshal, NFPA101 (One and two family dwellings) Federal Housing Authority (FHA), Housing and Urban Development (HUD).
features: 2-in-1 Detection - Smoke & carbon monoxide detector combo alerts you to both smoke & fire events as well as poisonous, CO gas in a single device
24/7 Self-testing components are always checking the device to ensure it's operating as expected (not a substitute for a manual push test)
Easy installation mounting bracket included for quick installation in 4 orientations
Photoelectric sensor detects visible fire particles associated with slow, smoldering fires, while the electrochemical sensor detects carbon monoxide
85-decibel alarm & LED warning indicators alert you to various status green = normal operation, amber = operating error, and red = smoke, fire or carbon monoxide event

title: Kidde Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, 10-Year Battery Powered, Voice Alerts, LED Warning Light Indicators
description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, 10-Year Battery Powered, Voice Alerts, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 30CUD10-V. This smoke & CO detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. To detect carbon monoxide, an electrochemical sensor is used. This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Voice alerts clearly announce “Fire!” or “Warning Carbon Monoxide!” to help identify which hazard is detected. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch combination alarm is powered by a 10-year built-in lithium battery, so you never have to change a battery for the life of the detector (not a battery performance claim). Plus, it’s self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. This Kidde combination alarm is equipped with end-of-life notifications that will beep to remind you it’s time to replace it at the of its 10-year lifespan. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217, UL 2034 4th Edition, FCC, and CSFM.
features: 2-IN-1 DETECTION Alerts you to both smoke & carbon monoxide (CO) using a single, cost-effective device.
NEVER-CHANGE 10-YEAR BATTERY No low battery chirps or battery changes for 10 years & saves up to $40 over the life of the detector. (10-yr limited warranty on alarm, not a battery performance claim.)
ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY Reduces false smoke alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition, UL 2034 4th Edition, & FCC standards.
VOICE ALERTS Crystal-clear voice alerts will say "Fire!" when smoke is detected or "Warning! Carbon Monoxide!" if CO is detected, so you can react quickly.
SELF-TESTING ALARM Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke or carbon monoxide detected & a loud 85-decibel alarm will sound.
EASY INSTALLATION No wiring needed, simply mount the bracket onto the ceiling and twist & click the 5-inch smoke & CO alarm into the bracket.
10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY Warranty begins when the alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced.

description: Magnesium complex with best values. 375 mg magnesium, 100 % daily requirement, 3 high-quality magnesium moulds. All information per 3 capsules of MAGNESIUM complex (daily serving). Magnesium complex made from the three highest quality magnesium forms: Magnesium Bisglycinate, Magnesium Malate & Magnesium Citrate Our magnesium complex combines the three magnesium forms with the highest bioavailability and thus ensures an effective and effective supply of magnesium. The magnesium complex covers 100% of the daily requirement of magnesium and thus makes a valuable contribution to a vital body. The daily serving of our magnesium complex consists of 3 capsules, which contain a total of 375 mg elementary magnesium. By using three high-quality organic magnesium sources in the form of magnesium bisglycinate, magnesium malate and magnesium citrate, the body can optimally absorb the magnesium contained.   Magnesium high dose for muscles, nerves, energy metabolism, bones and teeth. The mineral magnesium contributes to a variety of important vital functions in the body: From normal muscle and nerve function, to normal energy metabolism to reducing fatigue and fatigue. In addition, magnesium also contributes to the electrolyte balance, which athletes should pay special attention to. Approx. 60% of the magnesium stored in the body is stored in the bones and teeth. A good supply of magnesium therefore also contributes to the maintenance of normal bones and teeth.   Cover magnesium needs. According to the German Association for Nutrition (DGE), the daily requirement for magnesium is 300 to 400 mg. As a reference quantity, a supply of 375 mg magnesium was therefore determined by the EU for adults on a daily basis. Physical stress, e.g. through regular sports, but also an unbalanced diet can lead to the body getting less magnesium than it needs. Due to the important contribution that magnesium makes to the energy metabolism, poor magnesium supply directly affects physical performance. If you do intense sports, such as Strength training, crossfit, various endurance sports (running, swimming) or team sports, should pay particular attention to a good magnesium supply.   Highest bioavailability thanks to magnesium bisglycinate, magnesium malate and magnesium citrate. What is the use of a dietary supplement with high magnesium content, if only a fraction of the body is absorbed at all? Mineral magnesium forms such as Magnesium oxide or magnesium sulphate are difficult to absorb by the body. As these magnesium sources can be obtained particularly cost-effectively, they are found especially in very inexpensive magnesium products. Our aim was to develop a high-quality magnesium product with the best possible bioavailability. Therefore, we use the three best organic magnesium sources for our magnesium complex, which can be absorbed by the body particularly well: Magnesium bisglycinate, magnesium malate and magnesium citrate. Thanks to the combination of the three different magnesium sources, the body also has three different absorption paths, which achieves a higher absorption capacity than it would be the case with a single magnesium form. Magnesium complex vs. Other magnesium products.   Premium magnesium complex with the three best magnesium forms. Our Magnesium complex stands for absolute premium quality. Instead of cheap magnesium moulds, we use first-class organic magnesium sources. The first priority on the list of ingredients is magnesium bisglycinate, the magnesium form with the highest bioavailability - but at the same time the most expensive. In order to cushion the additional costs of the high-quality magnesium raw materials a little and thus to offer our MAGNESIUM complex attractively priced, we have chosen a large pack of 180 capsules. With a daily serving of 375 mg of elementary magnesium, the MAGNESIUM complex covers 100% of the recommended daily intake of magnesium. The individual magnesium moulds do not contain any animal components. We have also consistently avoided the use of unwanted additives such as silicon dioxide or magnesium salts of fatty acids (magnesium stearate, E 470 b). Also, the capsule shell is of course purely plant-based and therefore our magnesium complex is 100% vegan. Our recommendation: Complement your vital substance supply in addition to the magnesium complex with the following products. Omega-3 vegan. Vitamin D3 + K2. Vitamin B12 + folic acid. Vitamin C 400. Zinc bisglycinate. Durch die Depotwirkung bist Du mit einer einzigen Tablette VITAMIN D3 + K2 für 5 Tage optimal versorgt, was einer Tagesdosis von 1.000 IE Vitamin D3 und 40 mcg Vitamin K2 MK7 entspricht.   Das Sonnen-Vitamin D3 Vitamin D3, das Sonnenvitamin, wird durch die UVB-Strahlung der Sonne in der Haut gebildet - dazu muss aber die Haut direkt der Sonne ausgesetzt sein. In Deutschland ist es gerade in der dunklen Jahreshälfte eine große Herausforderung, dass der Körper auf diesem Wege genügend Vitamin D3 selbst bildet. Aber auch im Sommer ist die körpereigene Vitamin D3-Produktion beeinträchtigt: Kleidung, Schatten, Verglasung und Sonnenschutzcreme blockieren die UVB-Strahlen und beeinträchtigen die Bildung von Vitamin D3. Die DGE hat festgestellt, dass rund 1/3 der deutschen Bevölkerung die absolute Untergrenze an Vitamin D3 im Blut nicht erreicht und rät daher zu einer Nahrungsergängzung. Unser VITAMIN D3 + K2 enthält 5.000 IE Vitamin D3 pro Tablette und leistet damit einen wertvollen Beitrag zu einer guten Vitamin D3-Versorgung.   Vitamin D3 - Funktion im Körper Vitamin D3 wird in nahezu allen Bereichen des menschlichen Körpers benötigt. Vitamin D3 trägt zu einer normalen Aufnahme und Verwertung von Calcium und Phosphor aus der Nahrung bei. Darüber hinaus leistet Vitamin D3 leistet einen Beitrag für einen normalen Calcium-Spiegel im Blut. Gleichermaßen trägt Vitamin D3 zum Erhalt normaler Knochen und Zähne bei. Vitamin D3 hat ebenso eine Rolle bei der Zellteilung. Die Wissenschaft hat über die Jahre immer mehr Prozesse im Körper entdeckt an denen Vitamin D3 beteiligt ist. Dadurch dass die Möglichkeit Vitamin D3 über die Haut zu bilden durch unseren modernen Lebensstil stark eingeschränkt ist, wird eine gute Versorgung mit Vitamin D3 über eine hochwertige Nahrungsergänzung umso wichtiger.   Vitamin K2 MK7 - der perfekte Partner für das Vitamin D3 Das Vitamin K2 ist in den letzten Jahren durch neue Studien immer mehr in den Fokus gerückt. Man hat festgestellt, dass nicht nur Vitamin D3 zum Erhalt normaler Knochen beiträgt, sondern ebenfalls auch Vitamin K. Die aktuelle Empfehlung führender Mediziner ist daher, Vitamin D3 stets in Kombination mit Vitamin K2 einzunehmen. Unsere optimal abgestimmte Kombination aus 5.000 IE Vitamin D3 und 200 mcg Vitamin K2 leistet damit einen wertvollen Beitrag für den Erhalt normaler Knochen. Vitamin K gibt es in verschiedenen Formen, welche der Körper unterschiedlich gut aufnehmen und verwerten kann. Das VITAMIN D3 + K2 beinhaltet Vitamin K2 MK7, die Form, die im Vergleich am besten aufgenommen wird und auch am längsten aktiv ist. Weight 0.37 lb. 80 lumens Lumens Per Panel 44 lumens Screen Mirror Music Sync Previous page Shapes Mini Triangles Light Panels Canvas Next page Learn More Learn More Learn More Can I connect Nanoleaf Shapes with the Nanoleaf Light Panels or Nanoleaf Canvas? No, the Nanoleaf Shapes are not compatible with Light Panels or Canvas. You can connect any shapes together - Hexagons, Triangles,& Mini Triangles. All of our products can operate together in the Nanoleaf App even if they're not physically connected. How panels are mounted to the wall? Will they damage my wall? Mount your panels with the included double-sided tape onto any smooth and flat surface. When you mount them, leave the ends of the tape sticking out from the Mounting Plate so you can pull them along the wall later for a safe and easy removal. Are Nanoleaf lights waterproof? No, Nanoleaf products are NOT waterproof or water resistant. Our lights and adhesives are not designed to be exposed to high levels of humidity, and are therefore not recommended to be placed in washrooms, near the sink in kitchens, or outdoors. What is the difference between a Smarter Kit and an Expansion Pack? Every Nanoleaf Smarter Kit has everything you need to set up the lights. It includes a Controller and a Power Supply unlike Nanoleaf Expansion Packs. An Expansion Pack is an addition to a Smarter Kit which cannot be used without owning a Smarter Kit. What is the maximum amount of panels that will work with the included 42W Power Supply? The maximum amount of panels per included Power Supply is 22 for the Hexagons, 28 for the Triangles, and 77 for the Mini Triangles. If you are ever in doubt, check out the PSU Calculator on our website.

title: DASH Tasti-Crisp™ Electric Air Fryer Oven, 2.6 Qt., Black – Compact Air Fryer for Healthier Food in Minutes, Ideal for Small Spaces - Auto Shut Off, Digital, 1000-Watt
description: Cook healthier, crispy food in a dash with Tasti-Crisp™ Air Fryer! This versatile electric air fryer uses AirCrisp® technology, cooking food with hot air instead of oil, reducing added fat by 70-80%. Perfect for cooking, roasting or baking your favorite vegetables and frozen foods, this is a must have air cooker fryer for any kitchen.

CUSTOM PRESETS – Our digital air fryer includes three saved preset buttons and has a simple digital interface that allows you to choose from 200-400°F and up to 60 minutes. Also has an auto-shut off function to prevent overcooking and a cool touch handle.

title: Kidde Smoke Detector, AA Battery Powered, LED Warning Light Indicators
description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Smoke Detector, AA Battery Powered, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 20SDR. This smoke detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch smoke alarm is powered by 2 replaceable AA alkaline batteries (included) for continual detection even during outages. Batteries should be replaced every 6 months or when the alarm sounds a low battery chirp. In addition, it’s self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. This Kidde smoke alarm is equipped with end-of-life notifications that will beep to remind you it’s time to replace it at the of its 10-year lifespan. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217 and FCC. Does not meet requirements for CSFM.
features: DETECTS SMOKE Sounds a loud 85-decibel alarm when smoke is detected - 3 long beeps with red LED light flashing in time, repeating.
ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY Reduces false alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition & FCC standards.
NO WIRING NEEDED Operates on 2-AA alkaline batteries (included) providing easy installation, simply mount the bracket onto the ceiling and twist & click the 5-inch smoke alarm into the bracket.
SELF-TESTING ALARM Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke detected.
TEST & HUSH BUTTON Makes it easy to test the 5-inch smoke detector and silence false alarms, should they occur.
BATTERY REPLACEMENT Batteries should be replaced every 6 months, a low battery chirp alerts you when batteries need replacing.
10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY Warranty begins when the alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced.

title: Breville BOV650XL the Compact Smart Oven Countertop Toaster Oven, Brushed Stainless Steel
description: Similar to the Breville Smart Oven, but in a smaller, more compact design, this 1800-watt oven offers exceptional cooking convenience while taking up less space on the counter. The unit's 3/5-cubic-foot nonstick interior can accommodate a 12-inch pizza or four slices of bread at a time, while its push-button and turn-knob control panel makes it easy to program. Turn the control dial to select the function--options include Toast, Bagel, Bake, Roast, Broil, Pizza, Cookies, and Reheat. The oven's Element IQ "smart" sensor technology puts the power where it's needed most to ensure energy-efficient operation. For each of the eight pre-set functions, Element IQ automatically adjusts the power and calculates the cooking time. The time and temperature for the pre-set programs can also be manually adjusted to accommodate individual preferences--the oven will even remember the new settings for next time. Use the second control dial for setting the time (from one minute up to two hours) and for adjusting the temperature (from 120 to 450 degrees F), as well as for selecting the number of slices and for setting the toast shade, from light to dark. The control panel also offers a large start/cancel button, a defrost button for frozen foods, and a temperature-conversion button for recipes with cooking temperatures in Celsius. The oven's easy-to-read backlit LCD screen shows the current function, temperature, and adjustments made--plus it illuminates orange to indicate preheating and cooking, then blue to indicate the end of the cooking cycle. Other highlights include a tempered-glass door, three rack positions, and a front-access removable crumb tray for quick cleanup. Accessories include a 10-by-10-inch enamel baking pan and a 10-by-10-inch enamel broil rack. Attractively housed in coated steel with a strikingly modern design, the countertop oven measures 16-1/2 by 14-1/4 by 10 inches and carries a one-year limited warranty.

title: TP-Link Tri-Band BE19000 WiFi 7 Router (Archer BE800) | 12-Stream 19 Gbps | 2 × 10G + 4 × 2.5G Ports | LED Screen | 8 High-Performance Antennas | VPN, Easy Mesh, 4×4 MU-MIMO, HomeShield, Private IoT
description: Supercharged by the latest WiFi 7 technology, Archer BE800 takes your WiFi network's power and efficiency further than ever. Delivering unbelievable speeds up to 19 Gbps on a quad band channel with WiFi 7 exclusive features like 320 MHz channel and 4K-QAM, the Archer BE800 will crush its competition with sheer performance. 8 x High performance antennas provide stable and reliable connection while EasyMesh compatibility will aid in the future expansion of your network coverage. The included 1 x 10 Gbps SFP+ Fiber WAN/LAN combo port and 1 x 10 Gbps WAN/LAN port provides flexible support for both fiber and copper connection and 4 x 2.5 Gbps ports along with 1 USB 3.0 port ensure maximum expandability. features: 【Redefining Wi-Fi Routers】With powerful Wi-Fi 7 performance, lightning-fast wired connections, brand-new design, and LED screen.

【Lightning-Fast BE19000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 7 Speeds】Archer BE800 is designed with the latest Wi-Fi 7 technology, featuring Multi-Link Operation, Multi-RUs, 4K-QAM, and 320 MHz channels. With speeds of 11520 Mbps on the 6GHz band, 5760 Mbps on the 5GHz band, and 1376 Mbps on the 2.4GHz band, the Archer BE800 delivers fluent 4K/8K streaming, immersive AR/VR gaming and unparalleled Wi-Fi performance.

【Pro-Grade Dual 10G WAN/LAN Ports】Equipped with two 10G WAN/LAN ports—one RJ45 port and one SFP+ Fiber/RJ45 Ethernet combo port—Archer BE800 provides flexible support for both fiber and copper connections. The additional Four 2.5G ports and a USB 3.0 port make it an ideal solution for future-proofing your home network.

【Premium Components for Premium Experience】Proprietary Wi-Fi optimization and 8× optimally positioned antennas along with Beamforming deliver more capacity, stronger and more reliable connections, and less interference
【Flexibly Create Whole Home Mesh WiFi】EasyMesh-Compatible Works with EasyMesh routers and range extenders to form seamless whole home Mesh Wi-Fi, preventing drops and lag when moving between signals

【TP-Link HomeShield】TP-Link's premium security service keeps your home network safe with cutting-edge network and IoT protection. Free features 1. Basic Network Security including Security Scan and IoT Device Identification 2. Basic Parental Controls 3. Quality of Service 4. Basic Weekly/Monthly Reports. Visit TP-Link website for more information.
【Private IoT Network for More Security】Set up a separate WiFi for IoT devices and overlay HomeShield and advanced WPA3 encryption to better protect the security of your home network and IoT devices.

【VPN Clients and Server Supported】Allow devices in your home network to access remote VPN servers without needing to install VPN software on every device. Archer BE800 can run both the VPN and ordinary internet connections at the same time, delivering security and flexibility.
【Easy Set Up and Management】 Set up and manage your router in minutes with the free Tether App available for both Android and iOS devices.

【Extensive Compatibility】Use an Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant-enabled device to control Archer BE800 with just your voice. Backward compatible with all WiFi generations and works with any internet service provider (a modem is required for most internet service providers).

title: First Alert BRK 7010BFF-3 Hardwired Smoke Detector with Photoelectric Sensor and Battery Backup, 3-Pack , White
description: The First Alert 7010B hardwire photoelectric smoke alarm with battery backup is a hardwire 120V single or multiple station smoke alarm designed for residential home use and institutional locations such as hospitals, hotels, motels, dormitories and other multiple family dwellings. This alarm is inter-connectable and can be installed and linked with up to 18 compatible devices (up to 12 smoke alarms and 6 compatible devices like bells, horns and repeaters) so that when one triggers, all alarms sound. The First Alert 7010B emits loud 85Db audible alarm. The alarm also features a photoelectric smoke sensor, which is particularly effective at detecting slow smoldering fires. The First Alert 7010B hardwire smoke alarm with battery backup is packed with convenient features. The single test/silence button silences a non-threatening alarm or low battery warning; plus allows you to test the unit's functionality quickly. The latching alarm indicator will automatically identify which unit initiated the alarm if alarms are installed in a series – helping identify the initial location and source of an incident. The smoke detector also includes an optional drawer and mounting bracket lock to prevent tampering or removal of the 9-volt battery. End of life signal provides audible notice when the alarm needs to be replaced after 10 years of service. This alarm is backed by a 10 year limited and is tested to meet UL standards 217. Includes smoke alarm, mounting bracket, 9-volt backup battery and user's manual. Faster turnarounds on job sites with the easy-to-install, most-trusted alarms in home safety
features: 3 pack of 120-Volt hardwire smoke alarms with photoelectric sensor and battery backup
Features convenient 9 volt battery backup, silence/test button, dust cover, 85-decibel alarm
Inter-connectable with BRK and First Alert hardwired smoke and Carbon monoxide alarms
Intuitive Latching alarm indicator identifies which unit triggered alarm. Backed by 10-year limited warranty and tested to meet UL 217 standards
85 decibel alarm

title: Kidde Hardwired Smoke Detector, 10-Year Battery Backup, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators
description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Hardwired Smoke Detector, 10-Year Battery Backup, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 20SA10. This smoke detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. Plus, it is interconnected so when one alarm sounds, they all do so you never miss an emergency (see user guide for compatibility with other Kidde models). This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch smoke alarm is powered by 120V AC wiring with a 10-year built-in lithium battery, so you never have to change a battery for the life of the detector (not a battery performance claim). In addition, the detector is self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217, FCC, and CSFM.
features: DETECTS SMOKE Sounds a loud 85-decibel alarm when smoke is detected - 3 long beeps with red LED light flashing in time, repeating.
HARDWIRED & 10-YEAR BATTERY BACKUP Operates on 120V AC wiring (installed in the ceiling). No battery changes for 10 years & saves up to $40 over the life of the detector.
ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY Reduces false alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition & FCC standards.
SELF-TESTING ALARM Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
INTERCONNECT CAPABILITY When one alarm sounds, they all sound, so you can get out faster. (Different models offer different interconnection options and requirements. See User Guide for more info.)
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke detected.
TEST & HUSH BUTTON Makes it easy to test the 5-inch smoke detector and silence false alarms, should they occur.
10-YEAR WARRANTY Begins when alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced. (10-yr limited warranty on alarm, not a battery performance claim.)

title: READYWISE - Breakfast Bucket, 120 Servings, Emergency, MRE Meal, Food Supply, Premade, Freeze Dried Survival Food for Hiking, Adventure & Camping Essentials, Individually Packaged, 25 Year Shelf Life
description: At ReadyWise Food, we lead the food industry when it comes to emergency preparedness. We work with organizations like the American Red Cross to make sure families are ready for the unexpected. This is why we created our unique line of emergency food rations and meals, which are designed for use in natural disasters or for long-term shelf storage.Made from a combination of freeze-dried and dehydrated ingredients, each of our breakfast options tastes great while also providing the calories and protein your body needs for survival. The food retains its original flavor, shape, color, and nutritional value while taking up less space, and our innovative process doesn’t require hot water to rehydrate the meal (though it is preferred). Even if the power is out or you’re stuck on the mountain overnight, all you need is one cup of water of any temperature to rehydrate and enjoy a filling meal. The rations are sealed using an ultra-high-barrier film, which is designed to provide optimum protection for oxygen- and moisture-sensitive products with long shelf-life requirements. That means your emergency rations can last up to 25 years. Each bucket contains 120 servings with 4 different meal options to choose from: Strawberry Granola (20 servings), Crunchy Granola (20 servings), Apple Cinnamon Cereal (40 servings), and Brown Sugar Multi-Grain Cereal (40 servings).Whether you’re stocking emergency-preparedness supplies or looking for quality backpacking food, ReadyWise meals are easy, nutritious, and ready to go when you need them. Check out our entire selection of emergency, adventure, and everyday freeze-dried and dehydrated meals.
features: MORNING DELIGHTS Elevate your mornings with the ReadyWise Breakfast Kit. This exceptional kit offers a choice of four delectable breakfast options, ensuring you start your day right, no matter the circumstances. Whether you're embarking on a camping adventure or preparing for emergencies, these breakfasts are a delightful choice.

EASY PREP FOR BUSY DAYS Simplify your morning routine with the convenience of the ReadyWise Breakfast Kit. Just add water to enjoy a flavorful meal anytime, anywhere. Ideal for those hectic mornings when you need a quick, satisfying breakfast before heading out or for fueling up during your outdoor adventures.

LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS With a 25-year shelf life, you can trust that the ReadyWise Breakfast Kit will remain delicious and ready to serve for decades. Say goodbye to worries about expiration dates or the need for frequent replacements. These durable food pouches are built to last.

VARIETY ADDS EXCITEMENT Breakfast should never be boring, and with the ReadyWise Breakfast Kit, it won't be. You'll have a range of options, from crunchy granola to wholesome cereal. Rotate through these delightful choices to keep your mornings fresh and enjoyable.

NUTRITION FOR ALL AGEAS The ReadyWise Breakfast Kit isn't just delicious; it's packed with essential nutrients suitable for all age groups. Whether you're a child, an adult, or a senior, you can rely on this kit to provide the wholesome goodness your body needs to kick-start the day.

FAMILY-FRIENDLY CONVENIENCE The ReadyWise Breakfast Kit is perfect for family outings and adventures. Its versatile offerings cater to various tastes and dietary preferences, ensuring that everyone in your family enjoys a delightful morning meal, no matter where you are.

title: Marian Thistle, Artichoke & Dandelion Complex - 120 Capsules - Comparison Winner 2019* - High Dose with 80% Silymarin - No Magnesium Stearate, Vegan and Made in Germany.
description: Welche Pflanzenteile der Mariendistel nutzt ihr? Wir gewinnen den Extrakt direkt aus den Samen der Pflanze und nicht aus anderen Pflanzenteilen. So garantieren wir eine hohe Reinheit und eine ebenso hohe Qualität. In welcher Konzentration sind die 3 Pflanzenextrakte enthalten? Bei unserem Mariendistel Extrakt haben wir ein 25 : 1-Verhältnis, bei Löwenzahn 4 : 1 und bei Artischocke mindestens 4 : 1. Das heißt also, dass wir beispielsweise aus 25 Gramm Mariendistel 1 Gramm Extrakt gewinnen. Was heißt Extraktion? Bei der Extraktion werden die wichtigsten Bestandteile der Pflanzen schonend herausgelöst. So sorgen wir dafür, dass die wertvollen Pflanzenstoffe in möglichst hoher Konzentration in unseren Kapseln landen. Aus welchem Stoff besteht eure Kapselhülle? Die vegane Kapselhülle besteht aus Pflanzenfasern, der sogenannten Cellulose.
features: Outstanding value for money. 120 capsules with highly dosed 500mg of Marian Thistle Extract (80% Silymarin), 400mg artichoke extract (min. 2.5% cynarin) and 100mg dandelion root extract per daily dose (2 capsules). Gently extracted quality raw materials with guaranteed active ingredient containers in the complex.

Vegan and without undesirable additives It is free from magnesium stearate, release agents, flavours, dyes, stabilisers, fillers, gelatin and of course GMO-free, lactose-free, gluten free and without preservatives.
100% vegan. Our high-quality extracts are made from pure vegetable raw materials. By using a pure vegetable capsule shell made of cellulose (plant fibres), our product is 100% vegan.

Independent laboratory tested Laboratory tested for heavy metals, mould, E. coli, salmonella and more. The examination was carried out by an independent German laboratory certified according to DIN EN ISO/IEC 17025. (The analysis certificate can be found in the product images)
Made in Germany. Our dietary supplements are manufactured directly in Germany in strictly tested and certified plants. - -
