title: Take OFF Luggage - Personal Item Rolling Suitcase 2.0, TSA Approved, Small Carry On, Under the Seat, Hard Case with Removable Wheels, Light Weight Bag, Airplane Travel Essential Accessories, 18x14x8
description: Discover an Exciting Travel with TAKE OFF Luggage   Meet the Personal Item Suitcase 2.0 by TAKE OFF Luggage, a game-changer in travel convenience. This suitcase fits under the seat, avoiding additional carry-on fees. Engineered with durable materials and an organized interior, it offers ample space for your essentials. Whether it's a weekend getaway or a business trip, this under seat luggage with wheels is designed for maximum efficiency and style. Budget Airlines Charge for Carry-ons   Say goodbye to extra costs and hello to convenience with our range of travel luggage with wheels, perfect for any journey. Experience hassle-free travel with TAKE OFF Luggage. Designed to turn your carry-on into a free personal item, our innovative suitcase helps you save on airline fees while maintaining style and durability. With sleek designs and robust construction, TAKE OFF Luggage ensures your travel essentials are secure and easily accessible.     MAKING HISTORY We searched high and low for the right carry on luggage that was small enough to be labeled a personal item, but big enough to pack the right items comfortably. After testing under the seat luggages, and realizing they were too small. Then testing carry-on luggages and realizing they were too big. Our lightbulb moment came when we realized a carry-on without the wheels is the perfect size we are looking for. Personal Item Suitcase 2.0 Efficient Travel Companion Discover the "Personal Item Suitcase 2.0 Take Off Luggage," designed for seamless travel. Compliant with airline regulations, it fits under seats while offering durability and ample space. Organize efficiently with its compartments and pockets. Carry comfortably with a handle or shoulder strap. Perfect for business or frequent travelers, it blends style with functionality, ensuring hassle-free journeys every time. Dual functionality as a personal item and carry-on suitcase. Durable materials and a secure locking mechanism. Multiple compartments including a padded laptop sleeve and zippered pockets. Expandable capacity with a zippered expansion option. Durability and Performance: Built to Last   TAKE OFF Luggage's Personal Item Suitcase 2.0 is engineered for durability and top performance. Featuring a hardshell exterior and added bumpers for corner protection, this suitcase withstands the rigors of travel. Its ultra-durable design ensures long-lasting use, making it a reliable choice for frequent flyers. Whether you're navigating airports or enduring long journeys, our luggage provides superior protection and ease of transport. Innovative 360 Wheels and Secure TSA Lock   Experience unparalleled maneuverability with TAKE OFF Luggage's 360° removable wheels. Our unique design allows for effortless mobility, whether you're strolling through airports or navigating busy streets. Additionally, our TSA-approved lock ensures your belongings remain secure throughout your journey. With easy-to-follow passcode instructions, you can travel with peace of mind, knowing your items are safe and easily accessible. Maximized Space and Organization   The Personal Item Suitcase 2.0 by TAKE OFF Luggage offers exceptional space and organization. Featuring a dual-sided compartment and elastic straps, this suitcase maximizes storage while keeping your belongings neatly arranged. Perfect for packing efficiently, our design allows you to carry more without the bulk. Ideal for travelers who need ample space in a compact form, this suitcase is your go-to for both short and extended trips.
features: PERFECT AIRLINE PERSONAL ITEM This lightweight under-seat carry-on luggage fits 18x14x8 airline sizers and is ideal for personal item travel on budget airlines like Frontier and Spirit. Avoid overhead bins and extra baggage fees while enjoying the convenience of fitting under your airplane seat.

REMOVABLE WHEELS Transform this carry-on suitcase into a personal item travel bag by detaching the wheels or leaving them on for seamless rolling through airports. This flexible design allows the suitcase to serve as both a travel bag or a compact carry-on for various airline requirements.

SLEEK, MODERN DESIGN Compact yet spacious, our luggage features dual-sided interior storage with a zippered pouch. Keep your items separate, while the buckle closure ensures everything is neat and secure. Perfect for short trips, business travel, or longer ventures, giving you a flexible luggage option.

LIGHTWEIGHT & DURABLE Crafted from lightweight yet highly durable materials, this suitcase offers hard-shell protection to keep your belongings safe. Perfect for air travel, it seamlessly combines functionality with a stylish, modern design.

TSA-APPROVED LOCK Equipped with a TSA-approved, security lock to ensure security and privacy for your belongings. Keeping your items safe from unauthorized access while complying with airline security requirements. The perfect companion for any trip.

The ECOVER fabric softener apple blossom and almond in a 5L refill canister nourishes laundry gently and refreshes. It is well skin-friendly: it has been successfully dermatologically tested on sensitive skin. The active ingredients in the ecological fabric softener are based on European rapeseed oil and are palm oil-free. The formula is vegan friendly, as plant-based and all ingredients except minerals are biodegradable. The packaging is also sustainable, because it saves 27% plastic compared to 1.5 L bottles with comparable volume. The 5 litre refill pack of the concentrated fabric softener is enough for 166 washes. ECOVER is one of the largest manufacturers of ecological detergents and detergents in Europe. Founded over 40 years ago, ECOVER was one of the first companies to sell a phosphate-free detergent. With innovative spirit, experience and intelligent research, ECOVER has developed plant-based detergents and detergents with biodegradable ingredients that help consumers effectively keep their home clean. The ECOVER factory in Malle, Belgium is TRUE Zero Waste certified and uses renewable energy. Today, Ecover products are available in around 40 countries. Ingredients 5-15%: cationic surfactants. <5%: Fragrances (Linalool. Limonene geraniol). Lactic acid. Other: water. Alcohol. Propylene Glycol Magnesium chloride Directions 1. Give approx. Add 30 ml for each load to the dispenser of the rinse cycle or directly into the rinse water. 2. Follow the instructions of your washing machine to add fabric softener. Safety Warning Warning: Keep out of reach of children. Manufacturer Contact Information INDUSTRIEWEG 3, 2390 MALLE, BELGIUM. See more
features: The water-friendly fabric softener gently smells of apple blossom and almond; it is dermatologically tested on sensitive skin and is skin-friendly
With active ingredients based on European rapeseed oil, the fabric softener is vegan friendly, as it is plant-based; in addition, the formula is palm oil-free
Clean packaging – the sustainable detergent refill container made of recyclable plastic saves 27% plastic with comparable volume compared to 1.5 L bottles
It is dermatologically tested
Fabric softener with plant-based ingredients, ecological fabric softener for soft and fragrant laundry

title: Persil Ultra Concentrate Universal Gel Detergent 130 Washes (2 x 65), Highly Concentrated Liquid Detergent with Deep Clean Plus Technology Against the Most Stubborn Stains
description: Product Description Persil Ultra Concentrate Universal Gel - for deep cleansing that lasts a long time. The Persil Ultra Concentrate Universal Gel guarantees deeply pure results, combats even the most stubborn stains and is gentle on your favourite textiles. With its ultra-concentrated formula, the liquid detergent ensures excellent washing results and gives a long-lasting fresh feeling. It is not only good for clothing, but also good for the planet: the detergent works even at low temperatures from 20 °C to 95 °C. The Tiefenrein-Plus technology has been developed so that lower amounts of product can be used per wash load (-50% water added), which reduces both water consumption and the carbon footprint. In addition, the compact 1.35 litre bottle is made from 100% recyclable plastic, contains 50% less plastic than a regular bottle, and is easier to store, send and use. So Persil is continuously committed to a clean world. The product advantages in detail: Deep clean-plus technology. Long-lasting hygienic freshness. Fights the most stubborn stains. Effective washing performance at 20 °C - 95 °C. 50% less water added Made from 100% recyclable plastic 50% less plastic per bottle Lasts for 10 months (pack of 2) Instructions for use: Please always check the dosing instructions on the packaging. The dosing instructions depend on the size of the washing machine, the water hardness and the degree of dirt of the laundry. In case of medium soiling, half a cap of the liquid detergent is used, and a whole one is used for heavy soiling. Keep away from children. Persil remains Persil, because Persil does not remain Persil For more than 110 years, Persil has enjoyed great popularity and enjoys the trust of millions of consumers. Already at the introduction in 1907 as the first automatic washing powder, Persil 's time was ahead of its time and has been setting milestones in the development of new and sustainable detergents ever since. All products deliver decisive added value; they combine first-class performance with responsibility for people and the environment and allow efficient use of resources such as energy and water. Ingredients > 30%: anionic surfactants, 5-15%: non-ionic surfactants, <5%: soap, phosphonates, other ingredients: fragrances, enzymes, optical brighteners, citronellol, eugenol, limonene, hexyl cinnamal Manufacturer Contact Information D-40191 Düsseldorf See more
features: Deep clean plus - Thanks to deep clean plus technology, the gel detergent penetrates deep into the fibres and combats even the most stubborn stains and invisible dirt
Long-lasting freshness - With hygienic freshness effect, the liquid detergent effectively acts against odours and leaves nothing but long-lasting fresh textiles
Radiant purity - In addition to hygienic cleanliness, the high-quality formula of the detergent keeps white laundry radiantly bright - even after several washes
Highly concentrated formula - The universal detergent has a highly concentrated rich formula, so a 1.3 litre bottle is sufficient for 65 washes or 5 months
For a clean world - One bottle of Persil washing concentrate contains 65 washes, 50% less plastic, is made from 100% recyclable plastic and works even at low water temperatures

title: Hansaplast wound spray set of 1 (50 ml) for antiseptic wound cleaning, wound disinfectant spray for sensitive skin, colorless wound disinfection
description: Product Description Hansaplast wound spray - for quick, antiseptic wound cleaning through mechanical rinsing. Small injuries occur again and again in hectic everyday life. But even these inconspicuous injuries can cause infections if they are not cared for. Since a cleaned wound is the first step for optimal wound healing, a wound spray should be present in every household. The Hansaplast wound spray allows antiseptic wound cleaning by mechanical rinsing in acute injuries (e.g. cuts and abrasions, burns 1st and 2nd degrees or open bubbles). The application is quick and pain-free*. Thanks to the 360° spray head, it can be used in any position. As it also contains no alcohol and does not dry out the skin, it is ideal for children and sensitive skin. As directed by the doctor, the wound cleansing spray can also be used to treat chronic and post-operative wounds. In addition, encrusted or glued dressings can be moistened with the spray and then simply removed. Thanks to its composition, the spray is colourless, which makes it no stains on the skin or clothing. The product advantages in detail: Wound spray for antiseptic wound cleaning by mechanical rinse for acute wounds 50 ml. Alcohol-free, pain-free use. With 360° spray head. Colourless. *PMCF study, 95% approval "The wound spray is painless to use," n=59, Freese R, doctor, head of clinical trial, Hamburg, 2019) Ingredients 0.1% Decylglucoside surfactant and 0.04% Polihexanide (PHMB) as preservative in Ringer's solution. Directions From a distance of approx. Spray 10 cm on the entire wound to remove dirt and visible particles. If necessary, repeat the wound and also the surrounding skin dry afterwards. Apply a suitable plaster / sterile wound dressing so that the wound is protected from external influences such as dirt and bacteria. description: Propolis extract tincture, 20%, 30 ml Premium beekeeper quality. Laboranylised propolis extract Our propolis tincture contains pure propolis from 100% natural origin without any additives and chemicals. The high-quality propolis comes from regional as well as multi-regional, rural and idyllic beekeeping (e.g. Latvia). The elegant propolis tincture can be used for various applications. Flavonoids approx. 19% (standardised) polyphenols approx. 27% (standardised) Only natural and pure ingredients: Our propolis consists of pure propolis extract. We know our beekeepers and bee populations. The products are tested for pesticides and harmful substances. High-quality propolis premium tincture 20% as a drop with pipette Includes stylish, practical to-go round sleeve 100% beekeeper quality 100% natural origin without additives For a flavonoide approx. 19% (standardised) Polyphenols approx. 27% (standardised) What is Propolis? In addition to honey, flower pollen and royal jelly, propolis is considered one of the most important substances of bees. The substance, predominantly made of resin and wax, collect the worker bees and bring them to their hive. From the worker bees, the mushroom bees take on the propolis and use it for the insulation of the hive, the caulking of cracks and the propolis lay a kind of doormat at the entrance of the hive. This doormat serves as a disinfection for the home-returning worker bees and thanks to the disinfecting properties, bacteria, viruses and other harmful microorganisms cannot get into the inside of their stick. So that the beehive remains antiviral and sterile and thus keep other insects and bacteria away from it, the bees not only narrow the flight holes with the propolis, they kitten the entire stick with it. Only the bees can run over the propolis with their sensitive legs without any problems, all other insects would remain stuck in the sticky substance. So the bees use the propolis not only against foreign intruders, but above all to protect against diseases and bacteria within the bee people. Use: For skin care: Appropriate areas as needed 2-3 times a day with max. 5 drops. As oral care: Applied area in the mouth and throat area 1-3 times daily with max. 5 drops from the pipette or gargle with water. Ingredients: Ethanol (80%), propolis extract (20%) Important note: Not suitable for use with allergy or hypersensitivity of propolis and bee products. The product may cause stains. Do not contact with sensitive surfaces or clothing. Contains alcohol! Keep out of the reach of children. Shake well before use Due to the Health Claims Regulation (EC) No 1924/2006, which was put into force on 14.12.2012, we are unfortunately not able to specify more accurate information about the product and its area of application at this point. You can find and read detailed information on the internet on specific pages.   Example applications of propolis For external use, the tincture is particularly suitable for the skin and can help with the following ailments: Skin injuries, blemishes, small burns (e.g. sunburns) skin irritations, eczema and eczema, gum irritation, small mucous membrane injuries   Bee home We know the home of our hives, they are cautiously bred in the idyllic and rural regions free of exhaust gases and pesticides with great love.   Bee products We know which bee products are produced or harvested by our beekeepers. In this way, we receive Propolis, Gelee Royale, Blossom Poland, and also honey at the designated harvest times. Natural bee products are of great importance.   Laboratory analysis All beekeepers bee products are seen in different laboratories. In addition to impurities, we also check for the proportions of different polyphenols and flavonoids. The production of the propolis tinctures is free from harmful substances and chemicals.   Made with love From the bee for the whole family. Everyone will find something in our range. In addition to the alcohol-free tinctures for children and pets, via ethanol-containing tinctures to different capsule products, there is something for everyone. Made with love in Germany for you and your loved ones. description: Product Description Hansaplast Extra Robust Waterproof Resistant Plaster - Wound Plaster with Extra Strong Adhesion. Especially during outdoor activities, housework, gardening or DIY projects, small injuries and abrasions can quickly occur. With the extra robust plasters from Hansaplast a wound care is achieved that protects in challenging situations and can withstand any project. The plasters are equipped with High-Dry-Tex technology and are therefore particularly durable, waterproof and breathable. This is made possible by an impregnated, robust textile layer as well as a waterproof membrane that keeps wounds dry. The non-adhesive wound pad reliably cushions the wound. The Hansaplast Bacteria Shield protects against dirt and 99% of bacteria. Thanks to the extra strong adhesive strength, they are especially suitable for increased demands, do not slip and can still be removed without leaving any residue. The Hansaplast Extra Robust Waterproof Plaster is 100% latex-free and has no risk of allergy caused by latex. For even faster healing, the wound can be treated regularly with Hansaplast wound healing ointment. The product advantages in detail: Durable textile plaster. With Bacteria Shield With waterproof membrane. Extra strong adhesion. Breathable and flexible. Latex-free. Application: Clean the wound and gently remove small foreign bodies or dirt. Gently dry the skin around the wound. To allow undisturbed healing, the wound should be protected with a Hansaplast Extra Robust Waterproof Plaster or sterile wound dressing from Hansaplast Unless otherwise recommended by the doctor, the plaster or sterile dressing should be changed daily. title: Kidde Carbon Monoxide Detector with 10-Year Battery, Digital Display, 3 LEDs, Replacement Indicator, Peak Level Memory, 2 Pack
description: The Kidde Carbon Monoxide Detector with 10-Year Battery & Digital Display, model C3010D, is a carbon monoxide detector that uses electrochemical sensor technology to detect carbon monoxide. The CO detector is powered by a 10-year lithium battery that never needs replacing, plus protects during a power failure. The Kidde alarm is conveniently designed and portable enough for travel - simply install it on a wall or place it on a tabletop. When carbon monoxide is detected, an 85-decibel alarm will sound & a red LED will flash. A green LED indicates that the alarm is receiving power. And an amber LED indicates when it's time to replace the detector. The test-hush button allows you to test the battery operations as well as temporarily silence the low battery chirp warning. Plus, peak level memory records the last time carbon monoxide was detected or when the unit was last tested. Install a smoke detector & carbon monoxide detector on every level of your home and near bedrooms to help keep your family safe from fire & poisonous gas. UL Certified with a 10-year limited manufacturer's warranty.

Efferdent gives a variety of cleaning types: Complete Clean, Essential Clean, Minty Fresh & Clean and Overnight Clean. Efferdent is the first denture and retainer cleaning tablet brand accepted by the American Dental Association. Continuous Horsepower (CHP) is a term used in the treadmill industry for consumer comparison purposes. The CHP rating is measured in laboratory testing using a dynamometer, which measures the mechanical power of the motor. title: Renpho body fat scales, digital personal scales, Bluetooth body analysis scales with app, smart scales for body fat, BMI, muscle mass, protein, BMR
description: Tips before connecting to Renpho Health App: 1.Ensure Bluetooth and GPS(For Android) are enabled on your phone. 2.You need to grant Bluetooth permission to App in your mobile phone system settings. Otherwise, the scale will not connect with your phone even if you open the App. Inaccurate weighing/how to calibrate: 1. Remove one battery for 5 seconds, then reinstall it in the battery compartment to reset the scale. 2. Hold the scale with one foot until the scale display lights up. Then step away and wait for the screen to display ‘CAL’ (calibration). Doesn't work / Doesn't turn on 1.Change batteries with a new set. 2.Ensure the positioning of the batteries is correct. 3.If there is any rust on the surface of the battery compartment, please attempt to clean it. 4.Make sure all joints are completely tight. Can't connect to bluetooth / Not syncing with the App 1.Open the app. Under the "Home" section, select the top right "+", select "Body Fat Scale/Weight Scale" 2.Step one foot on the scale surface to wake it up. When the scale model number shows up (begins with "ES/R-A"), click the "+" next to it.
features: The Renpho app is easy to use and can be downloaded from the App Store or Google Play. The data in the Renpho app can be synchronised with Samsung Health, Fitbit, Apple Health and Google Fit.

Analyses of 13 important body data Renpho Smart body analysis scale monitor 13 important body data body weight, body fat, water, skeletal muscle, muscle mass, bone mass, protein, BMI (body mass index), BMR (basal metabolic rate).
Monitors your fitness The Renpho app helps you set goals, store historical data and track your daily, weekly and monthly progress.
Important notes Before measuring, please take off your shoes and socks. Place the scale on a hard and flat floor and step on the scale briefly to start the calibration.

Technical details 4 high-precision sensors, max. capacity 180 kg in 0.05 kg steps, easy switch-on as soon as you stand on them, automatic switch-on and off improves battery life. 3 x AAA batteries included.

title: Melatonin 365 Tablets (24 Months) - 0.5 mg Bioactive Melatonin per Day (1/2 Tablet) - Optimal High Dose - Laboratory Tested - No Unwanted Additive - Made in Germany - 100% Vegan
description: MELATONIN Tabletten mit 0,5 mg bioaktivem Melatonin Die MELATONIN Tabletten sind optimal dosiert und liefern pro Portion (1/2 Tablette) 0,5 mg bioaktives Melatonin - dem Schlafhormon in unserem Körper. Die Anwendung der MELATONIN Tabletten ist unkompliziert und effektiv: Einfach kurz vor dem Schlafengehen 1/2 Tablette mit etwas Wasser einnehmen. Melatonin Tabletten - optimal dosiert 0,5 mg Melatonin pro Portion (1/2 Tablette)365 Tablettenreicht für 730 Anwendungen Wirkung bei Jetlag: Melatonin trägt zur Linderung der subjektiven Jetlag-Empfindung bei. Die positive Wirkung stellt sich ein, wenn am ersten Reisetag kurz vor dem Schlafengehen sowie an den ersten Tagen nach der Ankunft am Zielort mindestens 0,5 mg Melatonin aufgenommen werden, was mit 1/2 Tablette Melatonin (Tagesportion) erreicht wird.   Das Schlafhormon Melatonin wird oftmals nicht ausreichend gebildet Das Schlafhormon Melatonin wird von unserem Körper selbst gebildet - hauptsächlich in der Zirbeldrüse (Epiphyse), aber auch z.B. in der Netzhaut der Augen. Wie viel Melatonin im Körper ausgeschüttet wird, hängt hierbei von den Augen ab. Fällt grelles Licht - also Tageslicht oder aus aus Displays auf die Netzhaut, hemmt dies die Bildung von Melatonin. Bei schummrigem Licht (z.B. Kerzenlicht) bzw. bei Dunkelheit wird hingegen die Ausschüttung von Melatonin angekurbelt. In unserer modernen Welt sind unsere Augen jedoch bis kurz vor dem Schlafengehen durch die Nutzung von Smartphones, Tablets und Co. teilweise sehr intensiven/grellen Lichtquellen ausgesetzt. Auf diese Weise fehlt dem Körper das Signal, dass es bereits Abend ist. Und genau an dieser Stelle setzen unsere MELATONIN Tabletten an.   Einschlafprobleme? Nein Danke! Vielleicht ergeht es dir auch immer mal wieder so oder so ähnlich: Nach einem anstrengenden Tag lässt Du dich erschöpft ins Bett fallen und willst eigentlich nur noch einschlafen. Doch anstatt nun zur Ruhe zu kommen, nimmt das Gedankenkarussell so richtig Fahrt auf und hält dich noch lange wach. Am nächsten Morgen stehst Du völlig gerädert auf, quälst dich mit jeder Menge Kaffee durch den Tag, bis dann am Abend alles wieder von vorne beginnt. Dieser Teufelskreis aus Einschlafproblemen, Schlafmangel und Koffein hat schon nach kurzer Zeit gravierende negative Auswirkungen. Die MELATONIN Tabletten liefern deinem Körper bioaktives Melatonin mit bestätigter Wirkung: Das Schlafhormon Melatonin trägt zur Linderung der subjektiven Jetlag-Empfindung bei. Die positive Wirkung stellt sich ein, wenn am ersten Reisetag kurz vor dem Schlafengehen sowie an den ersten Tagen nach Ankunft am Zielort mindestens 0,5 mg Melatonin aufgenommen werden, was mit 1/2 Tablette MELATONIN erreicht wird.   Melatonin Tabletten - ohne unerwünschte Zusatzstoffe - 100% vegan Für unsere MELATONIN Tabletten haben wir bewusst eine besonders kleine Tablettenform gewählt, sodass die MELATONIN Tabletten besonders einfach eingenommen werden können - ein großer Schluck Wasser genügt. Die MELATONIN Tabletten verfügen über eine Sollbruchkerbe und lassen sich daher einfach aufteilen. Bei der Produktion der MELATONIN Tabletten verzichten wir konsequent auf unerwünschte bzw. problematische Zusatzstoffe wie beispielsweise Magnesiumstearat, Trennmittel, Farbstoffe oder Überzugsmittel. features: Effective high dose the melatonin tablets contain 0.5 mg of bioactive melatonin per serving. We recommend taking half a tablet (= 0.5 mg melatonin) shortly before bedtime.

Confirmed effect the sleeping hormone melatonin contributes to the relief of the subjective jet lag sensation. The positive effect occurs when at least 0.5 mg of melatonin is absorbed on the first day of travel shortly before bedtime and on the first days after arrival at the destination, which is achieved with half a tablet of melatonin.

Easy to use simply take half a melatonin tablet (please separate at the predetermined breaking point) with a little water. The melatonin tablets are 100% sugar-free, so you can easily take them after brushing your teeth.

Essential oils will corrode the humidifier, causing the water tank or base to crack. Could I put the humidifier on the floor or a wooden table? Yes, but it isn’t the smartest move: 1. Best place to put a humidifier is where the most airflow is. 2. Potential of wetting the surroundings due to locally high humidity levels, it is recommended to put a tray underneath it. Is the bubbling/knocking sound it makes while running normally? It is normal for the humidifier to have bubbling sounds sometimes. It is the sound of water moving from the water tank to the base. Other times it is quiet and does not affect its performance. Can I use tap water or is distilled water preferred? It depends on where you live. In some areas, water is richer in minerals. The humidifier won’t instantly go haywire if you do use tap water, but in the long term will cause scale and you need to maintain it more often. Distilled water is recommended. Is it normal to have standing water in the base when you refill the water reservoir? Yes, it's normal. The water flowing from the tank to the base when you add water and place it back is part of the humidifier's operation. It draws water from the tank and disperses it through the base to increase room humidity.

features: PERFECT FOR ULTRA-LARGE ROOMS Improve indoor air circulation and purify 2,934ft² spaces in 60 minutes, or 586ft² in 12 minutes (CADR 664.6 m³/h). The top-performing air purifier is perfect for large room, office, high ceilings, and open-concept spaces.

The Never-Rust stainless-steel pre-filter and Bio-Guard filter are washable and reusable for up to 20 years. Ozone emission removal filter is reusable up to 20 years. The True HEPA and Carbon filter is replaceable in every 12 months. Search for B0BCS8W996 or NuWave HEPA/Carbon Combo Filter to find replacement filter. description: A handrail provides safety and support when climbing up or down the stairs. In particular, elder people may have decreased balance or stability, which can make it more difficult to climb stairs safely. A handrail provides a stable support to hold onto, which can help them maintain their balance and prevent falls. Using a handrail can also reduce the strain on their joints and muscles, making it easier for them to climb stairs. The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked. That's it! Your wall-mounted handrail is now installed and ready to use.   Locate the studs in the wall Use a stud finder to locate the studs in the wall where you want to install the handrail. Mark the locations of the studs with a pencil.   Drill holes Use a drill bit that's slightly smaller than the screws you'll be using to drill pilot holes into the studs. title: Alpine Corporation 14" Tall Indoor Tiered Log Tabletop Fountain with LED Lights
description: Transform any indoor space into a tranquil retreat with the Alpine Corporation 14" Tall Tiered Log Tabletop Fountain. This beautiful tabletop fountain features realistic log towers, bringing the charm of nature indoors. As water flows gently from tier to tier, it creates the calming sounds of a natural waterfall, adding a peaceful, serene atmosphere to your home or office. Constructed from a durable blend of resin, stone powder, and fiberglass, this indoor fountain is designed to be both long-lasting and weather-resistant. Whether you're relaxing in the evening or enjoying the fountain during the day, the lights enhance the tranquil mood and make this fountain a captivating focal point in your space. The gentle illumination draws attention to the flowing water, making it an eye-catching and calming feature in any room. This compact fountain stands 14" tall and measures 10"L x 7"W, making it the ideal size for small spaces like tabletops, desks, and shelves. It’s easy to set up: simply plug it into an outlet, fill the lower tier with water, and enjoy the soothing sounds of nature. The fountain is powered by an internal pump that keeps the water flowing smoothly, ensuring a continuous stream for maximum relaxation. Additionally, the fountain includes a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty, providing added confidence in its quality and durability. Whether you’re looking to create a peaceful oasis in your living room, add charm to your office, or enhance your décor with a calming water feature, the Alpine 14" Tall Tiered Log Tabletop Fountain is the perfect choice. With its realistic design, soothing water flow, and LED lights, it’s a beautiful and functional piece that will bring nature’s tranquility into your home.

They will find a spot in their family's home to sit and watch all day long. Each night, they fly back to report to Santa at the North Pole to tell him all your stories and adventures.

Now you can bring home your own Scout Elf, The Elf on the Shelf A Christmas Tradition storybook, a keepsake box, and an adoption certificate as a forever reminder they’re yours. It’s a magical experience you can share with the entire family.

Magic for Every Moment Scout Elves are silly, crafty, funny, and sometimes quite adventurous. You wake up each morning and find them hiding on Christmas trees, perching on Christmas decorations, hanging out with your toys, or disguising themselves as a nutcracker. Better keep an eye out for these elves every morning, because you'll never know where they'll land next.

A Christmas Tradition This beloved family tradition has captured the hearts of children everywhere who embrace the magic of having a Scout Elf who reports to Santa each night during the holidays. This boxed set has everything needed to make lasting Christmas memories. It's an extravaganzalorious Christmas experience that adds joy and laughter to your Christmas season and is fun for all ages.

title: Vitamin C High Dose - 365 Vitamin C Capsules - 500 mg Vitamin C Buffered - High-Quality Calcium Ascorbate Optimal High Dose - No Unwanted Additives - Laboratory Tested with Certificate
description: Vitamin C capsules with buffered vitamin C - high dose and optimally tolerated Immune system, cell protection and more: Our vitamin C capsules provide the body with 500 mg of high-quality vitamin C daily and thus make an important contribution to strengthening the defences. The high-dose capsules contain a buffered vitamin C, which is not only optimally tolerated, but also leads to a delayed release for a long-lasting supply of vitamin C. Vitamin C optimally high dose 500 mg vitamin C365 days optimally supplied, 100% vegan The Vitamin C capsules contain 500 mg of vitamin C per capsule made from high-quality calcium ascorbate and are therefore optimally high dosage. Thanks to their high dosage, the Vitamin C capsules not only cover the basic needs of vitamin C, but also a possible additional requirement due to intensive sports, illness or stress.   Vitamin C for immune system, cell protection etc. Probably the most well-known task of vitamin C is its contribution to normal functioning of the immune system. Vitamin C also helps to protect cells from oxidative stress. The body also needs vitamin C as an important building block in the formation of collagen fibres: Vitamin C contributes to normal collagen formation - for the normal functioning of blood vessels, bones, cartilage and skin. Another well-known function of vitamin C is to improve the absorption of iron from food into the body. Therefore, women should always pay attention to a good supply of vitamin C due to their higher iron requirements.   Vitamin C and sport - your actual vitamin C need The more you demand from your body, the more the daily need for vitamin C increases. Regular exercise increases the actual vitamin C requirement and therefore people who do intensive sports several times a week should consume 300 to 500 mg of vitamin C daily. The combination of a balanced diet with fruit and vegetables in combination with a high-quality vitamin C supplement ensures sufficient coverage of the actual vitamin C needs. Our vitamin C capsules provide the body with 500 mg of high-quality vitamin C daily and allow an optimal vitamin C supply even under intense loads.   Optimally tolerated thanks to buffered vitamin C Ordinary vitamin C, i.e. pure ascorbic acid, has a relatively acidic pH value. This can lead to gastrointestinal discomfort when taking a higher dose. For our vitamin C capsules, we have therefore deliberately chosen buffered vitamin C. This is vitamin C, which is bound to a basic mineral. The advantage: The acidic pH of ascorbic acid and the basic pH of the mineral balance out and the resulting vitamin C compound is in the neutral pH range. We use a high-quality calcium ascorbate as a buffered source of vitamin C - i.e. a compound of calcium and vitamin C. The calcium ascorbate is not only particularly stomach-friendly, but is also broken down and released much slower than pure vitamin C. Vitamin C capsules with valuable calcium ascorbate - laboratory tested, made in Germany and 100% vegan Our Vitamin C capsules are a high-quality dietary supplement at a fair price. With the calcium ascorbate, we use a first-class vitamin C form, which not only has a very high vitamin C content, but is also optimally tolerated. One can contains 365 capsules and thus serves as a storage pack for a whole year. The production of the Vitamin C capsules takes place exclusively in Germany and is therefore subject to the strict German guidelines for the production of dietary supplements as well as uncancelled controls. We also have the capsules regularly tested for all of them by an independent and certified laboratory. title: Magnesium Capsules 365 x 668 mg Magnesium Oxide, 400 mg Magnesium per Capsule, Very High Magnesium Content (60%), Laboratory Tested with Certificate, 100% Vegan, Supply for a Full Year
description: MAGNESIUM Kapseln - optimal hochdosiert mit 400 mg Magnesium Unsere MAGNESIUM Kapseln beinhalten hochwertiges Magnesium-Oxid und sind mit 400 mg Magnesium pro Tag optimal hochdosiert. Als essentieller Mineralstoff hat Magnesium eine Schlüsselfunktion bei vielen wichtigen Prozessen im Körper: Angefangen von der Muskel- und Nervenfunktion, über den Energiestoffwechsel und den Elektrolyt-Haushalt bis hin zum Erhalt gesunder Knochen und Zähne. Die MAGNESIUM Kapseln decken 107% des Tagesbedarfs an Magnesium ab und leisten damit einen wertvollen Beitrag für einen gesunden und leistungsfähigen Körper. Magnesium-Kapseln mit Bestwerten 400 mg Magnesium107 % Tagesbedarf365 Tage lang optimal versorgt Die Tagesportion unserer MAGNESIUM Kapseln besteht aus einer Kapsel und beinhaltet 668 mg Magnesium-Oxid, welches wiederum dem Körper 400 mg elementares Magnesium liefert. Auf diese Weise wird der Tagesbedarf an Magnesium zu 107% abgedeckt. Die MAGNESIUM Kapseln kommen in einem XXL-Vorratspack mit 365 Kapseln und reichen somit, bei täglicher Einnahme, für ein volles Jahr. Hochwertige Magnesium-Kapseln - Made in Germany & laborgeprüft Optimal hochdosierte Magnesium-Kapseln - frei von unerwünschten Zusatzstoffen und das Ganze zu einem sehr fairen Preis - diesen Ansatz haben wir bei der Produktentwicklung verfolgt. Durch unsere Entscheidung für einen Großpack mit 365 Kapseln ergeben sich gewisse Einsparungen, die es uns ermöglichen, die MAGNESIUM Kapseln entsprechend fairpreisig anzubieten. Die Produktion der MAGNESIUM Kapseln erfolgt ausschließlich in Deutschland und unterliegt somit den strengen deutschen Richtlinien zur Herstellung von Nahrungsergänzungsmitteln sowie unangekündigten Kontrollen. Zusätzlich dazu lassen wir die Kapseln regelmäßig durch ein unabhängiges Lebensmittel-Labor vollumfänglich analysieren und können somit garantieren, dass jede Kapsel auch die vollen 400 mg Magnesium beinhaltet.   Magnesium hochdosiert für Muskeln, Nerven, Energiestoffwechsel, Knochen und Zähne Der Mineralstoff Magnesium trägt zu einer Vielzahl wichtiger Vitalfunktionen im Körper bei: Angefangen von der normalen Muskel- und Nervenfunktion, über den normalen Energiestoffwechsel bis hin zur Verringerung von Müdigkeit und Erschöpfung. Darüber hinaus trägt Magnesium auch zum Elektrolyt-Gleichgewicht bei, worauf Sportler besonders achten sollten. Ca. 60% des im Körper gespeicherten Magnesiums ist in den Knochen und Zähnen eingelagert. Eine gute Versorgung mit Magnesium trägt daher auch maßgeblich , zum Erhalt normaler Knochen und Zähne bei.   Magnesium-Bedarf optimal abdecken Der Tagesbedarf an Magnesium liegt laut der Deutschen Gesellschaft für Ernährung (DGE) bei 300 bis 400 mg. Als Referenzmenge wurde daher seitens der EU für Erwachsene eine Zufuhr von 375 mg Magnesium täglich festgelegt. Körperliche Belastungen, z.B. durch regelmäßigen Sport, aber auch eine unausgewogene Ernährung können dazu führen, dass der Körper weniger Magnesium bekommt, als er benötigt. Durch die wichtigen Beitrag, den Magnesium für den Energiestoffwechsel leistet, wirkt sich eine schlechte Magnesiumversorgung direkt auf die körperliche Leistungsfähigkeit aus. Wer intensiven Sport macht, wie z.B. Krafttraining, Crossfit, verschiedene Ausdauer-Sportarten (Laufen, Schwimmen) oder Mannschafts-Sportarten, sollte besonders auf eine gute Magnesium-Zufuhr achten.   Hochdosierte Magnesium-Kapseln als Jahresvorrat Für unsere hochdosierten MAGNESIUM Kapseln verwenden wir mit dem Magnesium-Oxid eine Magnesium-Form mit einem außerordentlich hohen Magnesium-Gehalt von 60%. Andere Magnesium-Formen wie beispielsweise das Magnesium-Citrat, das Magnesium-Malat oder das Magnesium-Ascorbat verfügen über einen deutlich geringeren Magnesium-Gehalt von lediglich 10-15%. Eine Kapsel beinhaltet 668 mg wertvolles Magnesium-Oxid, welches wiederum den Körper mit 400 mg elementarem Magnesium versorgt. Mit einer einzigen Kapsel pro Tag ist der Magnesium-Bedarf des Körpers bereits optimal abgedeckt. Die MAGNESIUM Kapseln kommen in einer großen Vorratsdose mit 365 Kapseln. description: Relax and enjoy the sounds of nature with the Alpine Corporation 3-Tier Rock Fountain! Alpine Corporation is one of America's leading designers, importers, and distributors of superior quality home and garden decor products. Alpine Corporation's award winning in-house design team continuously develops new and innovative "statement pieces" for your home and garden. Your indoor and outdoor living spaces will be the envy of the neighborhood with our wide assortment of fresh, fashionable and contemporary products, from beautifully crafted solar garden stakes featuring patented motion and fiber optic lighting technology to beautiful fountains and delightful bird baths and feeders.

features:
TEGO GuideAlign Design

We all need a little assurance when performing a new yoga or workout pose. That’s why we use the GuideAlign design - to create a beautifully thought out posture reference map - to help you check your angle and take the full benefit of a pose. These include a Centre point Mandala, a Straight Line running through middle of the mat, and 45 degrees references to suit any height or workout style.

Truly Reversible

Feel for the Grip you want Keeping in mind, different priorities and preferences for kind of workout you want to practice, the Stance mat is dual layered and combines a sticky side (with the GuideAlign) on one side, coupled with a raised ultra-tactile honeycomb surface on the other. You can now stop picking your favorite side on a mat, and use the different textures to incorporate new styles of workouts and challenge your routine.

Closed Cell Construction

There is nothing more annoying than having your mat flake out, and start stinking just as you start getting used to it. The enemy here is usually moisture. The mat tends to become a source ground for sweat accumulation during rigorous workouts - which leads to breading of bacteria that cause decay and odour. TEGO Stance mat’s closed cell construction reduces the impact of your sweat seeping into the mat thereby improving durability and overall hygiene.

Superior Cushioning balanced with portability

Quality material and 5mm thickness ensure that the TEGO Stance mat is the practical choice for those looking for a mat that makes is easy on the joints, and light enough to lug around between home, the studio, and wherever else you want to practice. The TEGO Stance mat also comes with a carefully thought out quiver bag with a padded shoulder strap, and separate storage space for your keys, wallet, or a phone.

Responsible Material & Antimicrobial Protection

With many new innovations in materials used for mats today, PVC remains the most relevant from the viewpoint of balancing grip, cushioning, and weight. The PVC used for the TEGO Stance mat is free from lead and 6 most harmful phthalates. The TEGO Stance mat is also treated with antimicrobial technology for added protection from odour causing bacteria.
